description: Ransomware encrypting database backup files detected.
Unauthorized login detected to Authentication System from unusual location.
Malware detected on Employee Workstation. Antivirus quarantined the threat but further investigation needed.
Sensitive data from Database potentially exposed to unauthorized parties.
User reported phishing email that attempted to harvest credentials for Email System.
Distributed denial of service attack targeting Web Server
Suspicious activity detected from privileged user on Customer Portal.
Multiple failed login attempts followed by successful login to Active Directory.
Web application firewall detected and blocked attack attempt on Web Server.
Advanced persistent threat malware detected on Network Infrastructure with signs of data exfiltration.
Unauthorized access detected to Cloud Storage from IP address with known malicious history.
Ransomware infection detected on Database. Systems encrypted and ransom note found.
Sophisticated phishing campaign targeting executive emails discovered.
Application layer DDoS attack against Customer Portal login page.
Potential breach of Payment System with customer financial data at risk.
Unauthorized data access from terminated employee account.
SQL injection attempt detected and blocked on Web Server.
Targeted malware infection on executive workstation with signs of data theft.
Brute force attack against Authentication System from multiple source IPs.
Unauthorized physical access to facility housing Network Infrastructure.
